entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
